Stefano_package.cad_project

Class AiLiftProject2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stefano_package.cad_project.AiLiftProject2D

  • public class AiLiftProject2D
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a complete 2D CAD project: it has a list of Stefano_package.Stefano_package.components that is dynamically updated and, for each component insertion, it checks whether the component added will collide with all the others. It gives also a method to create a file that will make the CAD project visualizable and editable with other programs.

      Method to add Stefano_package.Stefano_package.components to the actual project -> dynamic creation and update
      protected void checkCollision(CadComponent cA, CadComponent cB)
      This method is used to check if two Stefano_package.Stefano_package.components collide If a collision occurs, a CollisionException is thrown The algorithm used to check collisions is a raw linear projection on the two axes: it works as a charm on rectangles but must be improved for circles and paths
      int getTotalComponents()
      Get method for Stefano_package.Stefano_package.components number

    • Method Detail

      • checkCollision

        protected void checkCollision(CadComponent cA,
                              CadComponent cB)
                       throws CollisionException
        This method is used to check if two Stefano_package.Stefano_package.components collide If a collision occurs, a CollisionException is thrown The algorithm used to check collisions is a raw linear projection on the two axes: it works as a charm on rectangles but must be improved for circles and paths
        Parameters:
        c1 - the first component
        c2 - the second component
        Throws:
        CollisionException

      • addComponent

        public boolean addComponent(CadComponent comp,
                            int dx,
                            int dy,
                            int tolerance,
                            int extrusionFactor)
        Method to add Stefano_package.Stefano_package.components to the actual project -> dynamic creation and update
        Parameters:
        comp - The component to add
        dx - x-shift (0 to ignore)
        dy - y-shift (0 to ignore)
        tolerance - The tolerance in collisions
        extrusionFactor - The required extrusion (0 to ignore)
        Returns:
        true if component is added, false otherwise

      • rmComponent

        public boolean rmComponent(java.lang.String componentName)
        Method to remove Stefano_package.Stefano_package.components from the actual project -> dynamic deletion and update
        Parameters:
        componentName - The component to remove
        Returns:
        true if component is removed, false otherwise

      • getTotalComponents

        public int getTotalComponents()
        Get method for Stefano_package.Stefano_package.components number
        Returns:
        the total Stefano_package.Stefano_package.components used in the project

      • toFile_jscad

        public java.io.PrintWriter toFile_jscad(java.lang.String fileName,
                                        boolean toExtrude)
        Method to create a .jscad file that describes the whole project
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name to give the file
        toExtrude - If true the project is rendered with the defined extrusion factor, otherwise it will be 2D only
        Returns:
        The project as a .jscad file
